data.approveAndCloseAnalysisNote:
Nyuma yo gusuzuma ubusabe bw’iyi nguzanyo n’inyandiko ziyiherekeza, ndemeza ko ingwate yatanzwe iteguye neza kandi yemewe. Ariko, amafaranga asabwa arenze ubushobozi bw’inyungu ubucuruzi bwinjiza n’agaciro k’ingwate.

Ndifuza gutanga igitekerezo cy’uko:

  1. Inguzanyo yagabanywa ikagera kuri Million 6 Frw;
  2. Uburyo bwo kwishyura ingunga bugahindurwa bukajya ku kwishyura buri gihembwe;
  3. Inyungu ikoreshwa ikaba 8% ku kwezi, bijyanye n’amabwiriza asanzwe y’ikigo.

Bishingiye kuri ibi, ndasaba ko iyi dosiye yoherezwa ku kanama (Forward to Committee) kugira ngo hakorwe isesengura ryimbitse kandi hafatwe icyemezo cya nyuma.

Niba ushaka version ngufi cyane ijyana neza na field ya Review Comments gusa, cyangwa ugashaka ihuzwe neza n’imyandikire ikoreshwa muri system yanyu, mbwire mbigushyiremo neza.

reviews.reviewMessage:
Mwiriweho MD

Nkurikije analysise nakoze kuri income z'uyu mukiriya ndetse na cash flow ye mmona amafaranga yasabye twayamuha gusa akishyurwa mu gihembwe aho kuba mu mwaka.

Inyungu ya kishyura ni 60% mu mwaka ni ukuvuga 5% ku kwezi

Nyuma yo gusuzuma dosiye y’inguzanyo, hagaragaye ko ingwate yatanzwe iteguye neza kandi ifite agaciro gahamye. Ariko kandi, amafaranga asabwa arenze ubushobozi bw’inyungu ubucuruzi bwinjiza, bikaba byateza ibyago mu kwishyura

Hashingiwe ku isesengura ryakozwe, birasabwa kugabanya inguzanyo isabwa ikagera kuri Miliyoni 6 Frw, guhindura uburyo bwo kwishyura bukajya buba buri gihembwe, ndetse no gukoresha inyungu isanzwe ya 8% ku kwezi Iyi myanzuro yafasha kugabanya ibyago ku kigo, no gufasha umukiriya kubona inguzanyo ijyanye n’ubushobozi bwe bwo kuyishyura Dosiyé ishyikirijwe komite kugira ngo ikomeze isuzume kandi ifate icyemezo cya nyuma hashingiwe kuri izi ngingo zisesenguwe. wifuza version ngufi version ikwiriye

Hashingiwe ku isesengura ryakozwe, birasabwa kugabanya inguzanyo isabwa ikagera kuri Miliyoni 6 Frw, guhindura uburyo bwo kwishyura bukajya buba buri gihembwe, ndetse no gukoresha inyungu isanzwe ya 8% ku kwezi Iyi myanzuro yafasha kugabanya ibyago ku kigo, no gufasha umukiriya kubona inguzanyo ijyanye n’ubushobozi bwe bwo kuyishyura Dosiyé ishyikirijwe komite kugira ngo ikomeze isuzume kandi ifate icyemezo cya nyuma hashingiwe kuri izi ngingo zisesenguwe. wifuza <strong>version ngufi version ikwiriye

Hashingiwe ku isesengura ryakozwe, birasabwa kugabanya inguzanyo isabwa ikagera kuri Miliyoni 6 Frw, guhindura uburyo bwo kwishyura bukajya buba buri gihembwe, ndetse no gukoresha inyungu isanzwe ya 8% ku kwezi.

reviews.reviewMessage: I have been Review All about This loan i see the collateral security is good organized please add your review on your side

Mwiriweho MD,

Maze kureba ubusabe bwa Avstars Cofee Shop ndabona asaba amafaranga menshi ugereranyije n'amafaranga yinjiza ku gihembwe ndetse n'agaciro k'ingwate. Igitekerezo cyanjye n'iki gikurikira:

Aho asaba million 10 yahabwa million 6

Aho kwishyura ingunga imwe mu mwaka yakwishura buri gihembwe kuko nibyo bijyane n'ibyo akora;

Inyungu twamuhera 8% ku kwezi nk'uko dusanzwe duhera abandi.

Murebe kumugereka aho nakoreye analysis.

Murakoze

Nyuma yo gusuzuma dosiye y’inguzanyo, hagaragaye ko ingwate yatanzwe iteguye neza kandi ifite agaciro gahamye. Ariko kandi, amafaranga asabwa arenze ubushobozi bw’inyungu ubucuruzi bwinjiza, bikaba byateza ibyago mu kwishyura.

Hashingiwe ku isesengura ryakozwe, birasabwa kugabanya inguzanyo isabwa ikagera kuri Miliyoni 6 Frw, guhindura uburyo bwo kwishyura bukajya buba buri gihembwe, ndetse no gukoresha inyungu isanzwe ya 8% ku kwezi.

Iyi myanzuro yafasha kugabanya ibyago ku kigo, no gufasha umukiriya kubona inguzanyo ijyanye n’ubushobozi bwe bwo kuyishyura.

Dosiyé ishyikirijwe komite kugira ngo ikomeze isuzume kandi ifate icyemezo cya nyuma hashingiwe kuri izi ngingo zisesenguwe.

Niba wifuza version ngufi, version ikwiriye “Approve & Close / Return for Rework / Forward”, cyangwa kuyihuza n’activeTab === 'review' uko wabivuze mbere, mbwira mbiguhindurire.

Nyuma yo gusuzuma dosiye y’inguzanyo, hagaragaye ko ingwate yatanzwe iteguye neza kandi ifite agaciro gahamye. Ariko kandi, amafaranga asabwa arenze ubushobozi bw’inyungu ubucuruzi bwinjiza, bikaba byateza ibyago mu kwishyura.

Hashingiwe ku isesengura ryakozwe, birasabwa kugabanya inguzanyo isabwa ikagera kuri Miliyoni 6 Frw, guhindura uburyo bwo kwishyura bukajya buba buri gihembwe, ndetse no gukoresha inyungu isanzwe ya 8% ku kwezi.

Iyi myanzuro yafasha kugabanya ibyago ku kigo, no gufasha umukiriya kubona inguzanyo ijyanye n’ubushobozi bwe bwo kuyishyura.

Dosiyé ishyikirijwe komite kugira ngo ikomeze isuzume kandi ifate icyemezo cya nyuma hashingiwe kuri izi ngingo zisesenguwe.
